mapper.select: SELECT n.num, n.title, n.writer, r.writer_name AS writer_name, r.PROFILE_IMG AS profile_img, n.readCount, n.category, n.thumbUrl, n.reg, n.hot, n.is_breaking from news n LEFT JOIN reporter r ON n.writer = r.id WHERE n.category = #{category} ORDER BY n.readCount DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY
SELECT n.num, n.title, n.thumbUrl, n.reg, r.writer_name, r.profile_img FROM news n LEFT JOIN reporter r ON n.writer = r.id WHERE n.title LIKE '%속보%' ORDER BY n.reg DESC FETCH FIRST #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT n.num, n.title, n.thumbUrl, n.reg, n.writer, r.writer_name, r.profile_img, n.category FROM news n LEFT JOIN reporter r ON n.writer = r.id ORDER BY n.num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news (num, title, writer, reg, readCount, hot, category, thumbUrl, is_breaking, content, status) VALUES (news_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, SYSDATE, 0, 0, #{category}, #{thumbUrl}, 0, #{content,jdbcType=CLOB}, 'wait')
mapper.select: SELECT n.num, n.title, n.writer, r.writer_name, r.profile_img, n.reg, n.thumbUrl, n.hot, n.category FROM news n LEFT JOIN reporter r ON n.writer = r.id WHERE n.category = #{category} ORDER BY n.reg DESC
SELECT n.num, n.title, n.content, n.writer, r.writer_name, r.profile_img, n.reg, n.hot, n.thumbUrl FROM news n LEFT JOIN reporter r ON n.writer = r.id WHERE n.num = #{num}
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET hot = hot + 1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select: select * from news where writer = #{writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by reg desc
